parsed_email.subject: RE: MV THALASSINI - CTM REQUEST at NEXT CONVENIENT PORT
parsed_email.body_text:
----boundary_50_d29e9d7f-7bf0-4a06-81db-46600e7f5e0d
Content-Type: text/plain; charset=utf-8
Content-Transfer-Encoding: quoted-printable

TO : "ASTRASHIP OPS" <ops@astraship.com>
CC : "ASTRASHIP/ACCOUNT" <accounts@astraship.com>

TO: OPS ASTRA
CC: As Address

Good day Sir/Ma’am,

Can you please advise on below if CTM can be arrange here in Santos.


Appreciate your kind reply.


Thank you and Best Regards,

Capt. Andy A. Padasas
M.V. Thalassini
Inmst-C: 422960910 / 422960911
Tel: +870771300910
Tel: +870773910831
E Mail: thalassini@vessels.astraship.com
------------------------------------------------
Prioritizing the wellbeing of our planet and its people.
 
This email may contain confidential and privileged information. Use or disclosure of it by anyone other than an intended recipient is prohibited. 
If you received this email in error, please notify the sender immediately by return email and destroy all copies of this email.
 
*Please consider the environment before printing*


-----Original Message-----
From: thalassini@vessels.astraship.com [mailto:thalassini@vessels.astraship.com] 
Sent: 06/07/2025 04:49
To: ASTRASHIP OPS (ops@astraship.com)
Cc: ASTRASHIP/ACCOUNT (accounts@astraship.com)
Subject: MV THALASSINI - CTM REQUEST at NEXT CONVENIENT PORT

TO: OPS DEPT.
CC: As Address

Good day Sir/Ma’am,

We kindly request to arrange CTM on our next convenient port after Santos

1. BALANCE OF THE CREW ON 31/Jul 2025:        USD 23,000
2. CASH FOR VESSELS EXPENSES:                 USD 10,000
3. CASH REQUIRED FOR SIGN OFF IF ANY:         USD 10,000
4. TOTAL:                                     USD 40,000
5. ROB CTM ON BOARD 31/Jul 2025:	          USD 19,058
6. CASH TO MASTER REQUIRED:                   USD 30,000


Thank you and Best Regards,

Capt. Andy A. Padasas
C/E Vicente R. Rizalado
M.V. Thalassini
Inmst-C: 422960910 / 422960911
Tel: +870771300910
Tel: +870773910831
E Mail: thalassini@vessels.astraship.com
------------------------------------------------
Prioritizing the wellbeing of our planet and its people.
 
This email may contain confidential and privileged information. Use or disclosure of it by anyone other than an intended recipient is prohibited. 
If you received this email in error, please notify the sender immediately by return email and destroy all copies of this email.
 
*Please consider the environment before printing*

classification.summary: The vessel is requesting to arrange Cash to Master (CTM) in Santos, with specific amounts for crew balance, vessel expenses, and sign-off cash.
